seo.title: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Tea Stores (2026)
seo.meta_description: Tea enthusiasts expect fast, trustworthy stores. See how 13 Shopify tea stores perform on pagespeed score. Median: 48, Top 10%: 77. Free benchmarks.
keywords: best pagespeed score for tea stores
how to improve pagespeed score shopify

key_findings: The average Tea store scores 50 on PageSpeed, falling into Google's "poor" category
Top 10% of stores achieve scores of 77+, giving them a significant competitive advantage
There's a 45 point gap between top and bottom performers in this niche
More than half of stores in this niche fall below Google's minimum acceptable threshold
Source: Boostra analysis of 13 Shopify tea stores, 2026-01-04.
how_to_improve: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight
Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets
Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code
Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store
Minimize main-thread work by deferring non-critical JavaScript
Reduce the impact of third-party scripts like analytics and chat widgets
Consider a performance-focused Shopify theme if your current theme is bloated

jsonld.name: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Tea Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 13 Shopify stores in the tea and beverages industry, measuring pagespeed score.

acceptedAnswer.text: PageSpeed Score is Google's comprehensive performance metric (0-100) that evaluates your site's speed and user experience. Higher scores correlate with better SEO rankings and conversion rates.

mainEntity.name: Why does PageSpeed Score matter for tea stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: PageSpeed Score is Google's comprehensive performance metric (0-100) that evaluates your site's speed and user experience. Higher scores correlate with better SEO rankings and conversion rates. Scores of 90+ are considered 'good', 50-89 'needs improvement', and below 50 'poor'.

mainEntity.name: What is a good PageSpeed Score for Shopify tea stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 13 Shopify tea stores, the median pagespeed score is 48. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 77. Scores of 90+ are considered 'good', 50-89 'needs improvement', and below 50 'poor'.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my tea store's PageSpeed Score?

acceptedAnswer.text: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight. Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets. Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code. Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store. For a personalized analysis of your store's specific issues and opportunities, consider a professional CRO audit.

mainEntity.name: How does my store compare to other tea stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can compare your pagespeed score against our benchmarks. If your score is better than 48 (the median), you're in the top half of tea stores. If you're better than 77, you're among the top 10% performers in your industry.
